nl.strohalm.cyclos.dao.accounts.transactions

Interface InvoiceDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDAO<Invoice>, InsertableDAO<Invoice>, UpdatableDAO<Invoice>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InvoiceDAOImpl

    public interface InvoiceDAO
extends BaseDAO<Invoice>, UpdatableDAO<Invoice>, InsertableDAO<Invoice>
    Data access object interface for invoices
    Author:
    rafael

    • Method Summary

      java.util.List<Invoice> search(InvoiceQuery queryParameters)

    • Method Detail

      • getSummary

        TransactionSummaryVO getSummary(InvoiceSummaryDTO dto)
                                throws DaoException
        Returns a summary for the invoices. Any exception thrown by the underlying implementation should be wrapped by a DaoException.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • getSummaryByType

        TransactionSummaryVO getSummaryByType(Currency currency,
                                    InvoiceSummaryType invoiceSummaryType,
                                    java.util.Collection<MemberGroup> memberGroups)
        Returns the summary (count and amount) of the invoices of a given type
        Parameters:
        currency - The currency
        invoiceSummaryType - the type of the invoice summary
        Returns:
        the count and amount of invoices of a given type

      • loadByPayment

        Invoice loadByPayment(Payment payment,
                    Relationship... fetch)
                      throws EntityNotFoundException
        Loads an invoice associated with the given payment
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - There's no invoice associated with the given payment

      • search

        java.util.List<Invoice> search(InvoiceQuery queryParameters)
                               throws DaoException
        Searches for invoices accordingly the parameters provided by queryParameters, ordering results by date descending. The direction and owner / relatedOwner parameters can only be used together If no invoice can be found, returns an empty List. Any exception thrown by the underlying implementation should be wrapped by a DaoException.
        Throws:
        DaoException
